overview: Composition for twenty photographs, sound effects and narrating voice. Twenty pictures taken between spring and summer 1934. A moving love story lost in the past. Mountains as a place of the soul, between Trentino and Südtirol. The photographs come from the director’s family archive, kept by his father Carlo, a retired professor. The female protagonist of the story is the director’s grandmother, Alessandra Buffatto, who was 21 at the time of the pictures. The short film is dedicated to her memory.
